courses.title: Introduction to Music Theory
courses.description: Learn the basics of music theory, including notation, scales, and chords.

courses.title: Piano for Beginners
courses.description: An introductory course to playing the piano, covering basic techniques and simple pieces.

courses.title: Advanced Guitar Techniques
courses.description: A course for experienced guitarists to master advanced techniques and styles.

courses.title: Songwriting and Composition
courses.description: Learn how to write and compose your own music in various genres.

courses.title: Jazz Improvisation
courses.description: Explore the art of jazz improvisation and develop your own improvisational skills.
